Contents: i think the most recent update broke my game again my computer just black screened while walking around in my ship
is there a way to turn off autojump?

i honestly dont think it's that, ive seen a lot of people on reddit with amd systems (i have a ryzen cpu) who've had blue screens from the game. plus most of my pc parts are under a year old, so i dont think its my systems fault tbh

are people still blue screening when playing the game? i havent touched the game in like two weeks since it blue screened my computer but i kinda wanna give it another shot now if the issues are fixed
anyone here with an amd cpu/gpu not having troubles? if so can you dm me your game settings, i keep crashing and my game just bsoded

does anyone know of any graphics settings to turn off for nvidia folks? i know amd users are having some issues with crashing but im having the same problems even with screen space reflections and anti aliasing off on a 4070. any help would be great
